title: Zechariah 6
content: Zechariah crowns Joshua, the high priest, in similitude of Christ, the Branch, who will come—Christ will be a priest upon His throne forever.
And I turned, and lifted up mine eyes, and looked, and, behold, there came four chariots out from between two mountains; and the mountains

And in the third chariot white horses; and in the fourth chariot grisled and bay horses.
